Interface ComponentRepository

All Superinterfaces:
CrudRepository<ComponentEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<ComponentEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ComponentEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<ComponentEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<ComponentEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<ComponentEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<ComponentEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<ComponentEntity,Long>
public interface ComponentRepository extends CrudRepository<ComponentEntity,Long>
Repository interface for managing ComponentEntity entities.

This interface extends CrudRepository and provides additional methods for querying components and their associated cars. It includes a custom query method for retrieving a list of components along with information about the cars that have those components.

  • Method Details

    • groupByComponent

      @Query("select new com.app.persistence.view.ComponentsAndCarsView(\n c.name, car.id, car.brand, car.model, car.color, car.price, car.speed)\n from ComponentEntity c\n join c.cars car\n group by c.name, car.id, car.brand, car.model, car.color, car.price, car.speed\n") List<ComponentsAndCarsView> groupByComponent()
      Retrieves a list of components and the cars that are associated with them.

      This method performs a join between the components and their associated cars and retrieves the component name and car details (such as car ID, brand, model, color, price, and speed). The result is grouped by the component and car details.

      Returns:
      a list of ComponentsAndCarsView objects containing component and car information.
